marmoset or white-eared marmoset, is a New World monkey that lives in the 
forests on the Atlantic coast of southeast Brazil. Of all the marmosets, it has the 
southernmost range. The buffy-tufted marmoset resembles the common 
marmoset but is ... Little is known about the buffy-tufted marmoset reproductive 
patterns.
